Happy Chinese New Year
All of us at Martell Singapore would like to thank everyone who joined us at L’Espace Martell, SAVOUR Christmas. We hope you enjoyed the gastronomic journey with the Martell Gourmet Passport and the pairing dishes that were a part of Martell Projects: Chef. We take this opportunity as well to wish you a happy Chinese New Year !
Get inspired and find more food pairing ideas here <[[http://www.facebook.com/martell.sg]]>.
